impact-statement: The complete architecture of human spliceosomal U1 snRNP and its interaction with the 5′ splice site of pre-mRNA are described in atomic detail.

present-address.pa1: California Institute for Quantitative Biosciences, University of California, Berkeley, Berkeley, United States

competing-interest.conf1: The authors declare that no competing interests exist.

equal-contrib.equal-contrib: These authors contributed equally to this work

contribution.con1: YK, Attempted to crystallize the whole of U1 snRNP, Crystallized, Determined the structure of the minimal U1 snRNP complex, Performed the 5′SS binding assay and analysed the data, Contributed to the manuscript
contribution.con2: CO, Attempted to crystallize the whole of U1 snRNP and refine the structure of the minimal U1 snRNP, Crystallized, Determined and refined the structure of the U1-70k-stem-loop I complex, Contributed to the manuscript
contribution.con3: A-MMR, Attempted to crystallize the whole of U1 snRNP, Contributed to the manuscript
contribution.con4: KN, Initiated and contributed to the U1 snRNP project since the beginning, Contributed to the manuscript
